alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northern Sacramento Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 2:58PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Shasta County through 400 PM PDT... At 257 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Centerville, or near Redding, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. Funnel clouds. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Redding, Palo Cedro, Anderson, Igo, Millville and Centerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northern Sacramento Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
